headline: 3M Annual Meeting Results
summary: At today's Annual Meeting of Shareholders, 3M (NYSE: MMM) shareholders overwhelmingly supported each of the proposals recommended for approval by the company.

raw.headline: 3M Annual Meeting Results
raw.summary: At today's Annual Meeting of Shareholders, 3M (NYSE: MMM) shareholders overwhelmingly supported each of the proposals recommended for approval by the company.

headline: 3M Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The 3M Board of Directors (NYSE:MMM) today declared a dividend on the company's common stock of $0.73 per share for the second quarter of 2025. The dividend is payable June 12, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 23, 2025.
